NewsArticle.Title: *Account Safety Reminder*
NewsArticle.Content:
This is just a reminder to all players that Nexon will NEVER ask for your account ID, character ID and/or password. Please be careful of the websites you visit and the materials you download.
Also, Nexon does NOT ask for any personal and/or financial information via email. Only give the information required when purchasing a coupon from the official site.
DA Team
